game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Achieve the retrieve artifact from the ancient temple
game.description: A legendary artifact has been stolen by rogue enemy forces, and your mission is to infiltrate the temple, retrieve the artifact, and return safely.

task.objective: Infiltrate enemy lines covertly to gain entry into temple
task.description: Travel through dense jungle to reach ancient temple.

task.objective: Rearrange puzzle pieces to activate artifact door
task.description: Use knowledge of the temple's history and architecture to solve a series of puzzles to open the artifact door.
Use weapon skill to take out enemy soldiers guarding the artifact, while also protecting yourself and any allies you bring in.
